menuItems.name: Miki
menuItems.description: Sautéed egg noodle that is soft and pale yellow in color topped with crispy garlic, veggies, meat, and freshly picked calamansi.

menuItems.name: Bihon
menuItems.description: Popular Filipino rice noodle dish stir-fried with vegetables, meat, and savory seasonings

menuItems.name: Miki-Bihon
menuItems.description: Delightful combination of two noodle varieties: egg noodles (Miki) and ice noodles (bihon) with meat, shrimp, and vegetables

menuItems.name: Palabok
menuItems.description: Savory noodle dish topped with a rich and flavorful shrimp sauce, garnished with assorted toppings such as meat, shrimp, egg, and crispy chicharron.

menuItems.name: Carbonara Platter
menuItems.description: Creamy pasta dish with eggs, parmesan cheese, meat and bacon.

menuItems.name: Spaghetti Platter
menuItems.description: Classic pasta tossed in a flavorful tomato sauce with ground beef/meat, hotdogs, and mushroom seasoned with aromatic herbs and garnished with freshly grated cheese.

menuItems.name: Spicy Oriental Noodles Platter
menuItems.description: Fiery fusion of traditional Asian flavors featuring thin noodles, vibrant vegetables, and a rich, spicy sauce.

menuItems.name: Lasagna Platter
menuItems.description: Layers of tendered pasta sheets, savory ground meat or vegetables, creamy cheese, and marinara sauce, baked with perfection.

menuItems.name: Baked Mac Platter
menuItems.description: Indulgent elbow macaroni smothered in a marinara sauce with ground beef and cheese baked to perfection, creating a golden, crispy crust.

menuItems.name: California Maki
menuItems.description: A classic sushi roll that embodies the essence of California, with creamy avocado, fresh crabmeat, and crisp cucumber, wrapped in a blanket of sushi rice and seaweed.

menuItems.name: Chicken Teriyaki
menuItems.description: Juicy grilled chicken marinated in a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, featuring a blend of soy sauce, ginger, garlic, and honey, creating a perfect balance of flavors.

menuItems.name: Japanese Tamago
menuItems.description: A popular traditional dish made with eggs and dashi (a Japanese stock showcasing a fluffy and slightly sweet egg mixture, delicately cooked and rolled into a neat cylinder.

menuItems.name: Volcano Sushi
menuItems.description: Sushi roll that combines fresh seafood with creamy avocado and spicy mayo, all rolled together in a layer of seaweed and sticky sushi rice then topped with tempura/tuna flakes.

menuItems.name: Kani
menuItems.description: Slightly sweet seafood product made from processed fish meat, mixed with starch, egg white, and flavorings.

menuItems.name: Spicy Shrimp
menuItems.description: Succulent, plump shrimp marinated in a fiery blend of chili peppers, garlic, and ginger served with a zesty lime sauce accompanied by vibrant vegetables.

menuItems.name: Mango Cream Cheese
menuItems.description: A delectable combination of smooth, creamy cheese blended with ripe, luscious mangoes offering a delightful balance of tangy creaminess and sweet tropical flavor.

menuItems.name: Miso
menuItems.description: Japanese noodle dish characterized by a rich and savory broth made from fermented soybean paste called miso. It includes wheat noodles, sliced pork or chicken, various vegetables like green onions and bean sprouts, and toppings like soft-boiled eggs and seaweed.

menuItems.name: Tonkotsu
menuItems.description: Japanese dish known for its rich and creamy pork bone broth featuring thin noodles, tender slices of pork, soft-boiled eggs, and various toppings like green onions and seaweed.

menuItems.name: Carbonara
menuItems.description: Creamy pasta dish with eggs, parmesan cheese, meat and bacon.

menuItems.name: Carbonara with 1 slice Pizza
menuItems.description: Creamy pasta dish with eggs, parmesan cheese, meat and bacon and an accompaniment of a pizza slice.

menuItems.name: Spaghetti
menuItems.description: Classic pasta tossed in a flavorful tomato sauce with ground beef/meat, hotdogs, and mushroom seasoned with aromatic herbs and garnished with freshly grated cheese.

menuItems.name: Spaghetti with 1 slice Pizza
menuItems.description: Classic pasta tossed in a flavorful tomato sauce with ground beef/meat, hotdogs, and mushroom seasoned with aromatic herbs and garnished with freshly grated cheese accompanied with a pizza slice.

menuItems.name: Spicy Oriental Noodles
menuItems.description: Fiery fusion of traditional Asian flavors featuring thin noodles, vibrant vegetables, and a rich, spicy sauce.

menuItems.name: Lasagna
menuItems.description: Layers of tendered pasta sheets, savory ground meat or vegetables, creamy cheese, and marinara sauce, baked with perfection.

menuItems.name: Gyoza (3pcs)
menuItems.description: Steamed dumpling consists of a thin dough wrapper filled with a mixture of ground meat (usually pork) and vegetables, such as cabbage, garlic, and ginger.

menuItems.name: Croquette (10pcs)
menuItems.description: Deep-fried food roll or patty made with a mixture of minced meat, mashed potatoes, or vegetables. It is often breaded and crispy on the outside while having a soft and flavorful filling inside.

menuItems.name: Cordon Bleu (1roll)
menuItems.description: Delicious fried pounded and flattened pieces of chicken filled with ham and cheese.

menuItems.name: Bento Meal
menuItems.description: Traditional Japanese meal consisting of a single portion of rice, protein (such as fish or meat), vegetables, and pickled items.

menuItems.name: Fried Oreo
menuItems.description: Delectable treat made by dipping Oreo cookies in a sweet batter and deep frying them until they become golden and crispy on the outside.

menuItems.name: Ham and Cheese
menuItems.description: Classic thin-crust pizza topped with tomato sauce, melted cheese, and slices of savory ham.

menuItems.name: Hawaiian
menuItems.description: Tropical thin-crust pizza topped with slices of ham, pineapple, and cheese.

menuItems.name: White Hawaiian
menuItems.description: White sauce-based pizza topped with ham, pineapple, and cheese on a crust that is complemented by a creamy garlic sauce.

menuItems.name: Pepperoni
menuItems.description: Classic pizza that features a thin crust topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and slices of pepperoni.

menuItems.name: Supreme
menuItems.description: Flavorful pizza loaded with a wide range of toppings including a combination of pepperoni, sausage, onions, bell peppers, black olives, and mushrooms.

menuItems.name: White Supreme
menuItems.description: Flavorful white sauce-based pizza loaded with a wide range of toppings including a combination of pepperoni, sausage, onions, bell peppers, black olives, and mushrooms.

menuItems.name: Meatlovers
menuItems.description: Savory pizza featuring thin crust topped with a generous assortment of various meat toppings, such as pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham.

menuItems.name: Smokey Bacon
menuItems.description: Crispy crust pizza topped with a generous layer of tomato sauce, gooey melted cheese, and a generous scattering of crispy bacon pieces.

menuItems.name: Sisig
menuItems.description: Flavorful sisig pizza features a crispy pizza crust topped with sisig, traditionally made with chopped pig's face and ears, seasoned with spices and citrus juice.

menuItems.name: Creamy Chicken Pizza
menuItems.description: Mouthwatering pizza variation featuring a luscious base of creamy sauce made with cheese, cream, and herbs and topped with tender, seasoned chicken pieces, along with a combination of other flavorful ingredients such as mushrooms, onions, and bell peppers.

menuItems.name: White Chicago
menuItems.description: Creamy white sauce-based pizza with a thick and buttery crust topped with a variety of ingredients such as spinach, mushrooms, and a generous amount of mozzarella cheese.

menuItems.name: 13 inches Chorizo Barbeque
menuItems.description: Thick-crust pizza topped with a generous amount of melted cheese, slices of chorizo sausage, and a drizzle of sweet barbeque sauce.

menuItems.name: 36 inches up to 5 flavors
menuItems.description: Thick-crust pizza with the customer’s preferred toppings/flavor.

menuItems.name: 50 pcs Assorted Sushi platter
menuItems.description: Deliciously packed assorted sushi with the customer's preferred sushi rendition.

menuItems.name: 40 pcs Assorted Sushi platter
menuItems.description: Deliciously packed assorted sushi with the customer's preferred sushi rendition.

menuItems.name: 40 pcs California Maki
menuItems.description: A classic pack of sushi roll that embodies the essence of California, with creamy avocado, fresh crabmeat, and crisp cucumber, wrapped in a blanket of sushi rice and seaweed.

menuItems.name: 40 pcs Chicken Teriyaki
menuItems.description: Pack of juicy grilled chicken marinated in a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, featuring a blend of soy sauce, ginger, garlic, and honey, creating a perfect balance of flavors.

menuItems.name: 40 pcs Japanese Tamago
menuItems.description: Dish made with eggs and dashi (a Japanese stock) showcasing a fluffy and slightly sweet egg mixture, delicately cooked and rolled into a neat cylinder.

menuItems.name: 40 pcs Spicy Shrimp
menuItems.description: A platter of succulent, plump shrimp marinated in a fiery blend of chili peppers, garlic, and ginger served with a zesty lime sauce accompanied by vibrant vegetables.

menuItems.name: 40 pcs Vegetarian Maki
menuItems.description: A platter of vegetarian maki consisting of various rolls filled with a combination of fresh vegetables, such as cucumber, avocado, carrots, and bell peppers, tightly wrapped in sushi rice and seaweed.

menuItems.name: 36 pcs Volcano Sushi
menuItems.description: A platter of sushi roll that combines fresh seafood with creamy avocado and spicy mayo, all rolled together in a layer of seaweed and sticky sushi rice then topped with tempura/tuna flakes.

menuItems.name: Gyoza Platters
menuItems.description: A platter of steamed dumplings consisting of a thin dough wrapper filled with a mixture of ground meat (usually pork) and vegetables, such as cabbage, garlic, and ginger.

menuItems.name: Croquette Platters

menuItems.name: Chicken Cordon Bleu Platters
menuItems.description: A platter of delicious fried pounded and flattened pieces of chicken filled with ham and cheese.

menuItems.description: Combination of 17 pcs. Gyoza, 17 pcs Chicken Crouquette and customer’s choice of pansit/pasta.
